com.imkrisna.samsung.nservice

Class NSDiscovery.NSDiscoveryListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.imkrisna.samsung.nservice.NSDiscovery.NSDiscoveryListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.cybergarage.upnp.device.SearchResponseListener
    Enclosing class:
    NSDiscovery

    private class NSDiscovery.NSDiscoveryListener
extends Object
implements org.cybergarage.upnp.device.SearchResponseListener

    This class implementing SearchResponseListener is a response handler for incoming SSDPPacket and parsing the information to decide whether the devices is N-Service capable device or not then storing the capable devices to NSConnection instance.

    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    I Made Krisna Widhiastra (im.krisna@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    NSDevice}, NSConnection}, NSDiscovery}

      • deviceSearchResponseReceived

        public void deviceSearchResponseReceived(org.cybergarage.upnp.ssdp.SSDPPacket ssdpPacket)

        public void deviceSearchResponseReceived(SSDPPacket ssdpPacket)

        Callback/Listener method to receive SSDPPacket bundle from networks. This method will parse and process the bundle to decide whether the device is N-Service capable or not then storing the capable devices to NSConnection instance.

        Specified by:
        deviceSearchResponseReceived in interface org.cybergarage.upnp.device.SearchResponseListener
        Parameters:
        ssdpPacket - - SSDPPacket bundle received from networks
        Since:
        1.0.0
